author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower niche exterior wall tips…in this shower I had to build niches on an exterior wall. Fortunately, it was 2x6 framing. I cut down blocking to add an insulated cavity. Then I built the niche with KERDI-BOARD to fit my tile layout. If you’re building a shower and need help, check out our Platinum membership at homerepairtutor.com 👍🏽🔥
title: Shower Niche Exterior Wall Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
